Subbed Projects.Show Name: Mahoutsukai ni Taisetsu na Koto: Natsu no Sora

Good Comments: long sentences doesn't make sense. lots of mistakes with small words as well... and seriously (bossy,conceited) "erasou" = "amazing" ??? it is more like an insult not a compliment, geez...
Bad Comments: Ayu and Conclave have always had a solid package in all their releases. Natsu no sora is no exception. Top score!
Only group that actually finished the series. Unfortunately, like everyone else, they use a horrible tv-rip, which seems to be the only encode available. Translation is decent.
Perfect timing for the subs and made the experience easy to digest. Fabulous work!

Good Comments: Good quality of video and subs. as always with conclave
Bad Comments: Translations are not very good. There's a subtitle comparison of the 4 groups at http://www.fansubbingis.srsfkn.biz/?p=103
